function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Leakages in heat recovery equipment leading to higher air leakage rates","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to compromised ventilation systems","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of heat recovery equipment to control leakages, and compensation by increasing outdoor air ventilation","Technologies":"Pressure difference measurement, heat exchangers with low leakage rates, outdoor air ventilation","People":"Occupants of buildings with compromised ventilation systems","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to airborne contaminants during maintenance activities","Mitigation":"Wearing masks, gloves, and respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","Technologies":"Masks, gloves, respiratory protection","People":"Maintenance staff, technicians","Owner":"Maintenance department, building management"},{"Description":"Open windows in toilets leading to improper pressure differentials and potential spread of airborne contaminants","Impact":"Risk of airborne disease transmission due to improper pressure differentials caused by open windows in toilets","Mitigation":"Avoiding the opening of windows in toilets, regular maintenance of water seals in sanitary devices, closing toilet lids when flushing","Technologies":"Regular maintenance of water seals, closing toilet lids","People":"Occupants of buildings with inadequate ventilation in toilets","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance staff, occupants"}]}
